resources.string: Deity
Welcome to Deity
Which Deity are you most similar to?
Do you have conflict with your colleagues often?
Yes, war is inevitable in the classroom.
Sometimes, but I can keep my cool usually.
Not at all, I am a peacemaker.
What is the most important thing in the list below?
Me duh!
My art creations. They define me.
My best buds!
When given a big task at home, you would:
Make my idiot sibling do it. It is called delegation.
Do it all myself. Yes I am cool like that.
Do it together with my idiot sibling. They can learn a lot from this.
Your children are playing in the kitchen near a hot stove. What do you do?
You freak out and stop them faster than they can blink.
Eh. Whatever they should be fine.
I do not care as long as they finish their chores.
All bad things come from:
Peoples\' actions.
The father of lies.
Gods
Restart
